1.1.28.name: wordpress/lodgixcom-vacation-rental-listing-management-booking-plugin
1.1.28.description:
The Lodgix.com Vacation Rental Listing, Management & Booking Plugin dynamically syncs your website with your data stored on Lodgix.com.
If you own or manage vacation rental properties this plugin will create a searchable / sortable listing interface for all of your rentals on your website, here are some examples:

Demo Listings LuxuryVacationRentals.net CityStyleApartments.ee VacationCountryRentals.com

Features

  • Supports vacation rental owners and managers
  • Perfect for B&Bs, condotels and boutique hotels
  • Support for Thesis 1.8 for WordPress
  • Multi-language
